GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v6.1.8
GSD.description:
usb: xhci: Check endpoint is valid before dereferencing it

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.8 by commit 08864dc14a6803f0377ca77b9740b26db30c020f, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit 50e8725e7c429701e530439013f9681e1fa36b5d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: usb: xhci: Check endpoint is valid before dereferencing it
